title: Saturday Special - Colin talks with Tony Grossi
itunes:title: Saturday Special - Colin talks with Tony Grossi
description:
Colin talks with Browns Writer Tony Grossi about the team and city that people claim he hates so much.  They discuss new head coach Freddie Kitchens, Baker Mayfield and how on paper this might be the most talented team the Browns have had in decades in this exclusive podcast 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
